name: Fixed Supply Token
description: ERC20 fungible token with fixed supply and ability to burn the tokens.

eventDecorators.name: Token transfer
eventDecorators.description: Indicates that ERC20 transfer has occurred.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address from which the ERC20 token was sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Recipient address
parameterDecorators.description: Address to which the ERC20 token was sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 token that was sent.

eventDecorators.name: Token spending approval
eventDecorators.description: Indicates that approval to spend ERC20 token has occurred.

parameterDecorators.name: Approver address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the owner who approved spending of their ERC20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: Spender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address for which the owner has approved to spend their ERC20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: Approved token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 token that was approved for spending.

constructorDecorators.name: Constructor
constructorDecorators.description: Deploys the ERC20 token with given token name and symbol. The initial supply provided is minted to the owner address specified as the last parameter.

parameterDecorators.name: Token name
parameterDecorators.description: Name of the token which will be deployed.

parameterDecorators.name: Token symbol
parameterDecorators.description: Symbol of the token which will be depoyed.

parameterDecorators.name: Initial supply
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the tokens to create as the initial supply. Once the supply is created, new tokens can't be minted anymore.

parameterDecorators.name: Supply owner
parameterDecorators.description: This wallet will become the owner of the initial supply.

functionDecorators.name: Burn tokens
functionDecorators.description: Destroys the provided amount of the tokens from the caller's wallet

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens to burn from the caller's wallet.

functionDecorators.name: Burn approved tokens
functionDecorators.description: Burn the tokens from the given wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: Wallet address
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the wallet to burn the tokens from.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens to burn from the given wallet.
